value.title: Own your SEO setup, don't borrow it
value.description: Transform your SEO into a core asset with deco.cx. Through its headless, agnostic platform, deco.cx equips you with full ownership and creative control over your code, ensuring your SEO strategy is as unique as your brand.

value.title: The fastest websites you will ever build
value.description: Deco.cx is engineered for peak performance â€” from robust hosting to the meticulousness of each line of code. Surpass your competition with blazing-fast websites that meet Google's Core Web Vitals standards.

value.title: Tailor your URL structure for ultimate visibility
value.description: Craft a bespoke URL structure optimized to perfection for each product catalog. With deco.cx, you have the power to not only customize your existing platform's URL setup, but also to establish unique rules and redirections that align with your brand's vision.

value.title: Tame Google Bot however you want
value.description: Deco.cx gives you full code access, enabling precise implementation of Google's rich data schema. Create and update sitemaps and tailor filters with complete freedom, ensuring your site communicates flawlessly with search engines.
